tier.item: My grandmother always LOOKED AFTER him
Wh-questions - wh-words have to marked as focus of their clause:
(8) kin-tek qon-te-l ord'o:l lebie ill'e mieste-gi a:-din?
who-PRED go-FUT-SF middle earth new place-his make-INF?
`Who will go and make new places (for life) on the middle earth?
